contents.text: Thank you for calling Criteo in New York, the advertising platform for the open Internet.
To speak with our advertiser solutions team, press 1.
To set up a new advertising campaign, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to an advertising campaign specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to launch a new ad campaign quickly.
I want to set up a new ad campaign to promote my veteran-led fitness coaching program.
I’d like to launch a new programmatic RTB campaign on Criteo.
Could you walk me through setting up a new advertising campaign? I’m not very tech‐savvy.
I want to set up a new digital ad campaign for my physics tutoring service.

contents.text: For campaign reporting and analytics support, press 2.
Please hold the line; an analytics expert will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: I need detailed analytics on my existing campaigns.
I need help pulling detailed analytics on my current ad performance to report to my grant sponsor.
I need help interpreting my campaign performance metrics and setting up custom analytics dashboards.
I’d like someone to explain my campaign reports and analytics in simple terms.
I need help interpreting the analytics and performance metrics of my current ad campaign.

contents.text: For publisher partnerships and support, press 2.
To learn about publisher monetization solutions, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our publisher partnerships team.

navigationGoals: I want to learn how to monetize my site as a publisher.
I’d like information on how to monetize my veteran resource blog through Criteo’s publisher platform.
I’m exploring how to integrate Criteo’s header-bidding solution to maximize my publisher yield.
I want to learn how to monetize my website with your publisher solutions.
I’d like to explore how to monetize my physics blog through Criteo’s publisher solutions.

contents.text: Please hold while we connect you to a publisher support agent.

navigationGoals: I'm experiencing technical issues with publisher integration and need support.
I’m having trouble integrating Criteo tags on my veteran support website and need technical assistance.
I need to troubleshoot latency errors in the Criteo publisher SDK integration on my site.
I need help troubleshooting and integrating publisher ads on my site.
I need technical assistance integrating and troubleshooting Criteo ad tags on my site.
